# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/sandler28.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/sandler28.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> sandler28.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bjtlev1;diode;vccs;valgrind;bsrc")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP sandler28.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} sandler28.cir ${OutputDataDir}/SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.prn sandler28.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED sandler28.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bjtlev1;diode;vccs;valgrind;bsrc")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> sandler28.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bjtlev1;diode;vccs;valgrind;bsrc")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP sandler28.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} sandler28.cir ${OutputDataDir}/SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.prn sandler28.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED sandler28.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}SANDLER28/sandler28.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bjtlev1;diode;vccs;valgrind;bsrc")
endif()
